meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Indonesia.
meanings.sent1: In Indonesia, people use rupiah to buy things.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for rupiah at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The rupiah in my pocket felt like a tiny treasure.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a million rupiah.
meanings.sent5: The colorful rupiah bills fluttered in the wind.

meanings.definition: A coin or note representing one rupiah.
meanings.sent1: I found a shiny rupiah coin on the street.
meanings.sent2: The shopkeeper handed me a rupiah note as change.
meanings.sent3: The rupiah coin rolled away, playing hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a rupiah note, easily forgotten.
meanings.sent5: The rupiah coin gleamed under the bright sun.
